thread.section_title: JUCY RV Rentals USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of JUCY RV Rentals USA | jucyrentals.com
thread.title: Holly MacNevin
thread.title_full: JUCY RV Rentals USA reviewed by Holly MacNevin

author: Holly MacNevin
title: Holly MacNevin
text: We absolutely loved our Jucy Van! It was fun, comfortable and extremely well outfitted. The company was a pleasure to deal with, both the New Zealand end of the company and the Las Vegas people. Everyone was friendly, accommodating and knowledgeable. We would rent a Jucy Van again in a heartbeat, and have recommended the company to everyone we know. Truly a wonderful experience!
